page.title: 02LIVING IN BOVINGDON
page.content:
We talked to twenty-five people who live in Bovingdon, twenty-three of them like living there. One couple had lived in the village all their lives.
Nineteen people had members of their family who work out of the village. One person we talked to worked in the village themselves. Six people work in London, eight in other local towns, and the others work in different places.
Thirteen people travel by car, five travel by bus, three walk and one goes by train. Only six people shop mostly in the village, of the others thirteen people shop in Hemel Hempstead, two in Chesham, and one in Watford.
